entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentException from RemoteDiagnosticAnalyzerService #66138
  • Bug: Using foreach, it's possible to accidentally mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66135
  • Roslyn fails to detect nested nullability mismatch in implicit conversions to delegates #66134
  • Roslyn fails to infer correct nullability in lambda expressions with user defined conversions #66131
  • Roslyn fails to infer correct nullability for lambda expressions with tuples #66130

Closed

  • RemoteInvocationException when updating package #66133
  • `SyntaxTree.GetChanges()` returns non-deterministic results #65580
  • IntelliSense and analyzers node are *completely* broken with legacy style .csproj projects and manual Roslyn multi-targeting #66047
  • Source Generator : FileNotFoundException Could not load file or assembly #66124

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce amount of stack used by CodeGenerator.EmitInstanceCallExpression #66137
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66132
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Cleanup dead MSBuild conditions #66052
    Area-Compilers, Community
